translation_texts.translated_text: Before playing, please set your age below:

By confirming, you:

1) agree that you have read our <link="PrivacyPolicy"><color=#40a0ff>[Privacy Policy]</color></link> and accept our <link="LegalDocument"><color=#40a0ff>[Legal Docs]</color></link>.

2) consent to our use of cookies for necessary features such as improving the game experience or handling issues, fraud, and online payments.
